gamerule.stretchy-leash.gracePeriod.desc:
How many ticks a leash can remain over-stretched before breaking. Gives leashed mobs an opportunity to get back within range.
Vanilla: 0
gamerule.stretchy-leash.lengthMax.descri:
How far a leash can reach before becoming over-stretched.
This does not affect the distance at which mobs start being pulled.
Vanilla: 10.0
gamerule.stretchy-leash.pullStrength.des:
How strongly leashed mobs are pulled toward the leader.
Helps when travelling at high speed.
Vanilla: 1.0
gamerule.stretchy-leash.stepHeight.descr:
The minimum step height of mobs being pulled by a leash.
Helps when travelling up slopes.
Vanilla: 0.0
